<h1 id="tetrahedron">Tetrahedron</h1>
<p><img src="https://www.pioneermathematics.com/formulasimages/regular%20tetrahedron.GIF" alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">a <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">float</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter triangle side area: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
h <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">*</span>a
sb <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">4</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">*</span>a<span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">2</span>
s <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">3</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">*</span>a<span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">2</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Height:{} Area of base:{} Surface area:{}"</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span><span class="token builtin">format</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>h<span class="token punctuation">,</span>sb<span class="token punctuation">,</span>s<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter triangle side area: 20
Height:16.32993161855452 Area of base:173.20508075688772 Surface area:692.8203230275509
</code></pre>
<h1 id="naive-bayes">Naive bayes</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python">ft<span class="token punctuation">,</span>mt <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">map</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter number of female and male teachers: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>split<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
fs<span class="token punctuation">,</span>ms <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">map</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter number of female and male student: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>split<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
total_t <span class="token operator">=</span> ft<span class="token operator">+</span>mt
total_s <span class="token operator">=</span> fs<span class="token operator">+</span>ms
total_f <span class="token operator">=</span> ft<span class="token operator">+</span>fs
total_m <span class="token operator">=</span> mt<span class="token operator">+</span>ms
total <span class="token operator">=</span> total_t<span class="token operator">+</span>total_s<span class="token operator">+</span>total_f<span class="token operator">+</span>total_m
pmt <span class="token operator">=</span> mt<span class="token operator">/</span>total_t
ptm <span class="token operator">=</span> pmt<span class="token operator">*</span>total_t<span class="token operator">/</span>total_m
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>total_t <span class="token punctuation">,</span>
total_s <span class="token punctuation">,</span>
total_f <span class="token punctuation">,</span>
total_m <span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Probability of teacher which are male is: "</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>ptm<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter number of female and male teachers: 10 12
Enter number of female and male student: 21 12
22 33 31 24
Probability of teacher which are male is:  0.5
</code></pre>
<h1 id="variance">Variance</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">variance</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 
    s <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">0</span>
    mean <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">sum</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token builtin">len</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
    <span class="token keyword">for</span> i <span class="token keyword">in</span> x<span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        s<span class="token operator">+=</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>i<span class="token operator">-</span>mean<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">2</span>
    var <span class="token operator">=</span> s<span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">len</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> var
n <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter observations: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">try</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 
    <span class="token keyword">while</span> <span class="token boolean">True</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        n<span class="token punctuation">.</span>append<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">except</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>variance<span class="token punctuation">(</span>n<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter observations: 
1
2
3
4
s
1.6666666666666667
</code></pre>
<h1 id="standard-deviation">Standard Deviation</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">sd</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> variance<span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">0.5</span>
n <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter observations: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">try</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 
    <span class="token keyword">while</span> <span class="token boolean">True</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        n<span class="token punctuation">.</span>append<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">except</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>variance<span class="token punctuation">(</span>n<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter observations: 
1
2
3
4
s
1.6666666666666667
</code></pre>
<h1 id="covariance">Covariance</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">covariance</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 
    mean_a <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">sum</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token builtin">len</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
    mean_b <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">sum</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token builtin">len</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
    s <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token number">0</span>
    <span class="token keyword">for</span> i<span class="token punctuation">,</span>j <span class="token keyword">in</span> <span class="token builtin">zip</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        s <span class="token operator">+=</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>i<span class="token operator">-</span>mean_a<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">*</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>j<span class="token operator">-</span>mean_b<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> s<span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">len</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
n <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>
m <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter x: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">try</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 
    <span class="token keyword">while</span> <span class="token boolean">True</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        n<span class="token punctuation">.</span>append<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">float</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">except</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter y: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> 
    <span class="token keyword">for</span> i <span class="token keyword">in</span> <span class="token builtin">range</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">len</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>n<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        m<span class="token punctuation">.</span>append<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">float</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
    <span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>covariance<span class="token punctuation">(</span>n<span class="token punctuation">,</span>m<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter x: 
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
df
Enter y: 
1
2
3
4
5
7
8
5.5
</code></pre>
<h1 id="mahalanobis-distance">Mahalanobis Distance</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">mahalanobis</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    mean <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">sum</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token builtin">len</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
    s<span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token number">0</span>
    <span class="token keyword">for</span> i <span class="token keyword">in</span> x<span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        s <span class="token operator">+=</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>i<span class="token operator">-</span>mean<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">2</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>s<span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>sd<span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">0.5</span>
x1 <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter observations: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">try</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span> 
    <span class="token keyword">while</span> <span class="token boolean">True</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
        x1<span class="token punctuation">.</span>append<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">except</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Mahalanobis Distance: "</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>mahalanobis<span class="token punctuation">(</span>x1<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>

</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter observations: 
1
2
3
4
s
Mahalanobis Distance:  1.7320508075688774
</code></pre>
<h1 id="manhattan-distance">Manhattan Distance</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">manhattan</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>x2<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y2<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token builtin">abs</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x1<span class="token operator">-</span>x2<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token builtin">abs</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>y1<span class="token operator">-</span>y2<span class="token punctuation">)</span>
x1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y1 <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">map</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter first data point: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>split<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
x2<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y2 <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">map</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter second data point: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>split<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Manhattan distance: "</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>manhattan<span class="token punctuation">(</span>x1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>x2<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y2<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter first data point: 1 2
Enter second data point: 5 6
Manhattan distance:  8
</code></pre>
<h1 id="euclidean-diatance">Euclidean Diatance</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">euclidean</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>x2<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y2<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>x1<span class="token operator">-</span>x2<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>y1<span class="token operator">-</span>y2<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token number">0.5</span>
x1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y1 <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">map</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter first data point: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>split<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
x2<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y2 <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">map</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter second data point: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>split<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Euclidean distance: "</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>euclidean<span class="token punctuation">(</span>x1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y1<span class="token punctuation">,</span>x2<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y2<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter first data point: 5 2
Enter second data point: 6 4
Euclidean distance:  2.23606797749979
</code></pre>
<h1 id="integration">Integration</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">integrate</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">pow</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>val<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token punctuation">(</span>val<span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">pow</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">pow</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
x<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">map</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter power and value for integration: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>split<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>integrate<span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter power and value for integration: 2 3
9.0
</code></pre>
<h1 id="differentation">Differentation</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">differentate</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">pow</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span>val<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token builtin">pow</span><span class="token operator">*</span>val<span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">pow</span><span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
x<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">map</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter power and value for differentation: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>split<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>differentate<span class="token punctuation">(</span>x<span class="token punctuation">,</span>y<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter power and value for differentation: 2 2
4
</code></pre>
<h1 id="determinant-of-2x2-matrix">Determinant of 2X2 matrix</h1>
<p><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">det</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>mat<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token builtin">abs</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>mat<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token operator">*</span>mat<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span> <span class="token operator">-</span> mat<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token operator">*</span>mat<span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
matrix <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span>

<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter 2-d matrix rowwise:"</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> 
<span class="token keyword">for</span> i <span class="token keyword">in</span> <span class="token builtin">range</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>          
    a <span class="token operator">=</span><span class="token punctuation">[</span><span class="token punctuation">]</span> 
    <span class="token keyword">for</span> j <span class="token keyword">in</span> <span class="token builtin">range</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">2</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>      
         a<span class="token punctuation">.</span>append<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span> 
    matrix<span class="token punctuation">.</span>append<span class="token punctuation">(</span>a<span class="token punctuation">)</span> 
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>det<span class="token punctuation">(</span>matrix<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter 2-d matrix rowwise:

</code></pre>
<h1 id="sigmoid">Sigmoid</h1>
<p><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQgeGz7OEf4HGVQBWbpTwNg1pgSKeW29Gw9iU0fPrmNIGBagIKg&amp;s" alt=""></p>
<pre class=" language-python"><code class="prism  language-python"><span class="token keyword">import</span> math
<span class="token keyword">def</span> <span class="token function">sigmoid</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>m<span class="token punctuation">,</span>x<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">:</span>
    <span class="token keyword">return</span> <span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">/</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token operator">+</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>math<span class="token punctuation">.</span>e<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token operator">**</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token operator">-</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>m<span class="token operator">*</span>x<span class="token operator">+</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
m<span class="token punctuation">,</span>x<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b <span class="token operator">=</span> <span class="token builtin">map</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token builtin">int</span><span class="token punctuation">,</span><span class="token builtin">input</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token string">"Enter m,x,b: "</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">.</span>split<span class="token punctuation">(</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
<span class="token keyword">print</span><span class="token punctuation">(</span>sigmoid<span class="token punctuation">(</span>m<span class="token punctuation">,</span>x<span class="token punctuation">,</span>b<span class="token punctuation">)</span><span class="token punctuation">)</span>
</code></pre>
<pre><code>Enter m,x,b: 1 2 3
0.9933071490757153
</code></pre>
